title: 86/274/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 May 1986 concerning the zones referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2616/80 instituting a specific Community regional development measure contributing to overcoming constraints on the development of new economic activities in certain zones adversely affected by restructuring of the steel industry
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 27 May 1986
concerning the zones referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2616/80 instituting a specific Community regional development measure contributing to overcoming constraints on the development of new economic activities in certain zones adversely affected by restructuring of the steel industry
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(86/274/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The zones referred to in Article 2 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2616/80 are, in the case of Italy, as follows:
the provinces of Naples, Livorno, Taranto and Genova.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 May 1986.
For the Commission
Alois PFEIFFER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 271, 15. 10. 1980, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 27, 31. 1. 1984, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 228, 13. 8. 1981, p. 14.
